interaction_ease.question_text: How easy was it to interact with Compass and understand its responses?
interaction_ease.description: Focuses on how easy it was for the user to interact with Compass, rated on a scale of 0 to 4.

clarity_of_skills.question_text: Did Compass help you gain a clearer understanding of your skills? If not, why?
clarity_of_skills.description: The user can answer true if Compass clarified their skills or false if it did not.

satisfaction_with_compass.question_text: How satisfied are you with Compass?
satisfaction_with_compass.description: Measures the user's overall satisfaction with Compass, rated on a scale of 0 to 4.

accuracy_relevance.question_text: How accurate and relevant do you feel the identified information is? Why?
accuracy_relevance.description: Assesses the perceived accuracy and relevance of the information provided by Compass.

incorrect_skills.question_text: Are there any skills that Compass incorrectly identified for you?
incorrect_skills.description: The user can answer true if any skills were incorrectly identified or false if none were.

missing_skills.question_text: Are there any skills you have that Compass did not identify?
missing_skills.description: The user can answer true if any skills were missed or false if all skills were identified.

skill_recognition.question_text: Did you feel that the app recognized and valued your skills fairly, without making assumptions based on your background, language, or other personal characteristics?
skill_recognition.description: The user can answer true if they felt their skills were recognized and valued fairly, or false if they did not.

recommendation.question_text: Would you recommend Compass to other job seekers?
recommendation.description: Measures how likely the user is to recommend Compass, rated on a scale of 0 to 10.

additional_feedback.question_text: Any other feedback or suggestions for improving Compass?
additional_feedback.description: Collects additional comments or suggestions for improving Compass.
